title: Fertility rate in Sub-Saharan Africa 2017
yAxis: Number of children born per woman
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of children born per woman, containing a total of 11 data points.
In general Number of children born per woman has fallen over the Year.
Number of children born per woman is slightly decreasing from 2007 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Number of children born per woman, about 5.42 was reported at Year 2007
The lowest Number of children born per woman, of value 4.77 was reported at Year 2017
